item.description:
Let's start the summer off with a bang! Ok, maybe not a bang, just a fun time with a great group of people? Let's get together at my house for a day/night of games and BBQ. We start out with outdoor games then move inside once it get's dark or the mosquitos come, for indoor games! Badminton,croquet, bocce...are some choices.

Please indicate what you would like to bring for food to share on your RSVP. Paper goods and utensils are covered.

Also, there are 2 cats on premises that will be confined upstairs for those with pet allergies.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: It's BBQ TIME!
